concept.title: Glossary entries
concept.shortdesc: Glossaries, which provide definitions of key ideas or concepts, can be authored as concepts.

conbody.p: Currently there is no separate information type to provide glossary-specific markup and no transforms to provide glossary-specific output and sorting.You can store all glossary entries in a single concept file, either as child concepts or in a definition list. Authoring as separate concepts makes it possible to manage links to and from particular entries using your maps.
